value: hey I want to talk about covert
aggression covert aggression as separate
from passive aggression passive
aggression essentially is characterized
by resistance to the point where it
becomes aggressive but covert aggression
is is actually active aggression just
hidden and couched and done in such a
way that the aggressor can always employ
plausible deniability they weren't
actually being aggressive and the most
insidious part of this is usually
someone targeted by covert aggression
ends up looking like they are the
aggressor it is crazy making it as a
form of gaslighting behavior and I think
it is rampant in our culture right now
which is why I want to talk about it
covert aggression is not less aggressive
than straight-up aggression it's just
different but it is equally as damaging
moreso I argued I have a theory that
good systems go bad primarily due to
covert aggressive behavior within them
undermining smear campaigning
triangulation gaslighting techniques
associated with narcissism sociopathy
another very character desert disturbed
individuals
and to me the real insidious part the
part that causes the most damage to the
system as a whole is the fact that the
people targeted by covert aggression
have so few ways out of it and that
generally it's their good character
traits which lead them to be the targets
of the covert aggression in the first
place
how is it that they don't have any good
defenses well it's because this type of
aggression is very secret and
underhanded and done it with the
plausible deniability baked into the
cake picture yourself at a party and
there's someone at the party who you
know has animosity towards you they have
actively demonstrated their dislike of
you and their wish to control you or to
get rid of you but really only you know
this it's not this person is not overtly
aggressive so you're at this party this
is a scenario to show you one of the
behaviors I'm talking about you're at
this party you try to avoid this person
and you would expect that a mature adult
another mature adult would also try to
avoid you that you could have a peaceful
evening where they didn't just you
didn't disturb each other but a covert
aggressive person won't let that happen
what they will do is they will show up
if you're standing there talking to two
other colleagues they will join the
group and they will say things that only
you know are troublesome and so put
yourself in that position the first time
all right maybe you just walk away
excused yourself you don't want to be
part of this but then this person will
do it again and again over the course of
the night
what good defense do you have at that
point I mean you could take the person
aside and tell them to stop but they
won't stop because they are being
actively aggressive although it's in a
covert manner your other option in that
scenario is to call the person out
publicly that's not going to work
because the
other two people in your little group
aren't gonna understand where your
aggression is coming from you're going
to look unreasonable the final option
you have is just to leave but then you
lose you're leaving a party that you
probably would have liked to be at and
then that person is free to say and do
whatever they want in your absence which
is a kind of threat that overhangs your
decision-making process what happens to
people that are targets of covert
aggression generally is they take one of
those three actions and they pay the
consequences for it and so you can
imagine if there's a covert aggressive
person inside of a system that they will
just choose targets over and over and
slowly one by one get rid of them and
who do they choose choose the people who
have the characteristics that could make
a system better conscientiousness
responsibility openness trust honesty
they choose those people because they
see a real threat when someone is a
mentally healthy emotionally healthy
person in their environment with
creativity that build strong
relationships they can't compete with
that so they have to eliminate the
threat so slowly over time covert
aggressive people because their tactics
are so stealthy and so effective will
eliminate all of the good people from a
system because they just they resort to
these dirty underhanded tricks in the
minute anybody responds to them in an
aggressive fashion as they should be
responded to in an aggressive fashion as
they are aggressing upon you the optics
are so bad the optics make the true
target of the original aggressive act
end up looking like the aggressor I
think we have to find ways I don't know
the answer to this I don't know how we
can find ways to out the covert
aggressors from our midst to make them
own their own aggression I think at the
baseline these people are true cowards
and what they are afraid of most is
themselves they have no ability to deal
with their own perceived negative
qualities or negative emotions and so
the covert
aggressive does things to bring those
emotions out in other people and use
them against them
my deeper theory on this is that those
people have so much anger and resentment
and they hate that so much about
themselves that they inspire that
feeling in the people around them and
then punish those people for displaying
the emotion they despise in themselves I
don't know if just riffing it occurred
to me today because well I still have

they're hiding behind the group they're

they're hiding behind the phrase human

bitter unable to own the parts of

they're part of this fallible flawed

they're projecting their own fears and
